feed.title: BIP70: why Google Protocol Buffers for encoding?

entry.title: BIP70: why Google Protocol Buffers for encoding?
entry.summary: In this context, the writer Richard expresses gratitude towards the people who answered his question. He acknowledges that their answers helped him understand the design choice better. He also mentions that regardless of whether one agrees with the design or not, it now makes more sense to him. The message is simple and to the point, with no additional information provided.
